segments.text: My gaze drifts over to the left side of the kitchen, and there's another unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is attempting to reach into an open cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" is plainly visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, two-step stool, which looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, and it appears to be tipping backward at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched, one hand already in the cookie jar, the other holding a plate like a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Near him, a girl stands with one arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is almost admirable, in a mischievous way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, I hope that stool doesn't completely give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so determined in their quest for sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute, really, but also quite risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of them falling is still very unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
